info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 5:56PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Cabarrus, east central Mecklenburg and southeastern Rowan Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 555 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Salisbury to 9 miles east of Kannapolis to 9 miles south of Downtown Concord. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Salisbury, Downtown Concord, Spencer, Granite Quarry, Rockwell, Mt Pleasant, Faith, High Rock Lake, Midland and Mint Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
